SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: C_EA_Overdue_Invoices_Response_Monitoring_Service_Contracts

DataColumn.Column: (SELECT LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(v1.DATE_TO, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY v1.DATE_TO) FROM &AO.SC_SRV_CONTRACT_INVPLN_CFV v1 WHERE v1.CONTRACT_ID = SC_SERVICE_CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID AND v1.DATE_TO < SYSDATE AND v1.CF$_PERIOD_FULLY_INVOICED_DB = 'FALSE')
DataColumn.Name: Date To

SQLDataSource.Where: CONTRACT_TYPE LIKE NVL('$CONTRACT TYPE$','%') AND CONTRACT_ID IN ( SELECT v.CONTRACT_ID FROM &AO.SC_SRV_CONTRACT_INVPLN_CFV v WHERE v.DATE_TO < SYSDATE AND v.CF$_PERIOD_FULLY_INVOICED_DB = 'FALSE' )
